remarks: The value of the ` Z/nZ ` structure.  It is defined as the quotient ring ` ZZ / n ZZ ` , with an "artificial" ordering added to make it a ` Toset ` .  (In other words, ` Z/nZ ` is a _ring_ with an _order_ , but it is not an _ordered ring_ , which as a term implies that the order is compatible with the ring operations in some way.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ zncrng2 as of 13-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
znvalOLD.z $e |- Z = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) $.
znvalOLD.s $e |- S = ( RSpan ` Z ) $.
znvalOLD.u $e |- U = ( Z /s ( Z ~QG ( S ` { N } ) ) ) $.
zncrng2OLD $p |- ( N e. ZZ -> U e. CRing ) $.
